question.title: Discord JDA getVoiceState() returning NULL
question.body:
Member member = event.getMember();
GuildVoiceState memberVoiceState = member.getVoiceState();
if(!memberVoiceState.inAudioChannel()){
event.reply("join a vc first");
}

here the memberVoiceState is NULL for some reason, I got the error Cannot invoke "net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.GuildVoiceState.inAudioChannel()" because "memberVoiceState" is null for some reason, I also tried setMemberCachePolicy(MemberCachePolicy.VOICE) at the JDA Builder and still doesn't seem to help
